Title: Relates to reimbursement for home health services; appropriation
Summary: Increases reimbursement for certain home health services provided by an individual or shared aide provided by an approved home health agency to include an amount necessary to cover the disparate labor and overtime costs associated with complying with the COVID-19 vaccine mandate and to offer incentive pay to retain and recruit workers.
LawCode: Amd ยง368-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to reimbursement for home health services; and making in appropriation therefor
